text: Châtillon-la-Palud is a commune in the Ain department in eastern France. ==Geography== The commune is located in the Dombes. It lies on the right bank of the Ain, which flows south through the commune's eastern part. The Albarine flows into the Ain in the southeastern part of the commune. ==Population== ==See also== *Communes of the Ain department *Dombes ==References== *INSEE ==External links== *Dombes and the city of Chatillon_la_Palud Category:Communes of Ain Category:Ain communes articles needing translation from French Wikipedia
title: Châtillon-la-Palud
